msg: This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'TOMCAT_5_5_8'.

author: remm
msg: - When Tomcat runs on Windows (I tested XP), and when IE is uploading data, the first read must be at least 8KB, otherwise IE enters
"OMG, the server is NOT IIS, so let's switch to crap-performance" mode.
- Other browsers don't have similar problems.
- The issue is much less noticeable when Tomcat runs on Unix.
